    Utility methods for working with JPA and Spring.

    • Method Detail

      • getPageRequest

        public static org.springframework.data.domain.PageRequest getPageRequest(int page,
                                                                         int limit,
                                                                         boolean descending,
                                                                         java.util.Set<java.lang.String> orderBys,
                                                                         java.lang.Class<?> entityMetaModelClass,
                                                                         java.lang.String defaultField)
        Get a page request to be used when querying the database which sets the page, limit, order direction and order by parameters for querying the databases.
        Parameters:
        page - The page to get starting with index 0. page * limit = first element returned.
        limit - The number of elements to return after the starting element.
        descending - Whether the order should be descending or ascending.
        orderBys - The fields to order the results by.
        entityMetaModelClass - The class of the entity we're evaluating against.
        defaultField - The default order by field to use.
        Returns:
        The page request to use.
